# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Threads

function pig_latinify(texts::Vector{String})
  threads = Threads.@threads for text in texts
    first_vowel = findfirst(chr->"aeiou", text[1:3], case=false)
    shifted = string(TextRange(text[first_vowel..-1]) . "ay" . TextRange(text[1:first_vowel-1]))
  end
  return collect(threads)
end
```
